desc: 低確率で被ダメージを超絶軽減＆ターン毎にＢＢゲージを増加・ＨＰを大回復＆被ダメージ時、ＢＢゲージを少し増加・確率でＨＰをかなり回復

dictionary.lore: A shield created by the demon Mordlim when she became intrigued by human technologies. She combined these with otherworldly techniques in its construction. It is said that when the wielder is in danger, the phantom insects that dwell in its core create a barrier that grants impregnable defenses. Morldim originally created this shield for her own use, and thus there have been reports of unprepared human users being devoured by the phantom insects within it.

name: 魔蟲樹盾マガジュラ

materials.name: 魔鳳冠ヴァーミリオン

usage.name: 絶界壁シュトゥルモア
